locations.name: Moorea
locations.description: Known as the 'Magical Island', featuring dramatic volcanic landscapes, lush valleys, pineapple plantations, and calm lagoons ideal for water activities.

locations.name: Bora Bora
locations.description: Famous for its iconic turquoise lagoon dominated by Mount Otemanu, luxurious overwater bungalows, and opportunities to swim with sharks and rays.
